= Fields =

The fields is the soul of forms, and Rabbit Forms provide a great gamma of fields to use, and offer a high customizable field abstract class to implement your own fields, see the list of built-in Rabbit Forms fields below.

== Field List ==

This is a list of Rabbit Forms fields, click at field name for see details.

|| *Field* || *Description* ||
|| [FieldCheckBox CheckBox] || Simple checkbox field ||
|| [FieldCheckBoxGroup CheckBoxGroup] || A group of checkbox ||
|| [FieldDate Date] || Calendar date field ||
|| [FieldDropDown DropDown] || Simple drop down ||
|| [FieldFile File] || File upload field ||
|| [FieldForeign Foreign] || Foreign field for relational data ||
|| [FieldList List] || Abstract list field ||
|| [FieldRadioGroup RadioGroup] || Radio group field ||
|| [FieldTextArea TextArea] || Text area field ||
|| [FieldTextBox TextBox] || Text box field ||

Don't found a field for your needs? [FieldExtend Implement it]!
